questions.text: When Woody asked Kelly how her class went, how did she respond?
questions.correct: I'd rather not talk about it.
options: Shut up and leave me alone.
questions.explanation:
I'd rather not talk about it.

	She said it in a very calm voice. But then she apologized for jumping down Woody's throat.

questions.text: Cliff said Norm knows a lot about what?
questions.explanation:
Getting a job.

	He said that for a guy who knew so much about getting a job it was odd Norm wasn't working. Norm replied, "I know a lot about water too, but you don't see me drinking it."

questions.text: At what bar did Kelly get a job in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Cheers.

	Rebecca agreed as a favor to Woody. Rebecca kept accidentally breaking glasses so she told Woody to tell Kelly to wear shoes.

Sam.

	Lilith was not too sure it was a good idea. Frasier convinced her because they'd only be gone a few hours.

questions.text: Who locked himself in the bathroom?
questions.explanation:
Frederick.

	Sam climbed out of one window, and into the bathroom window, to help Frederick. Frederick, however, closed the bathroom window and went back into the other room. The other window had shut on its own, so Sam couldn't get back in the house and had to climb (or rather fell out of) a tree and returned to the house that way.

questions.text: What did Carla tell Kelly a tip was?
questions.correct: A gift for the head waitress
options: Money for doing a good job
Money that everyone in the bar splits at the end of the night
questions.explanation:
A gift for the head waitress.

	Carla was using Kelly to make extra money. Kelly was clueless so it worked.

questions.text: What happened while Sam was outside?
questions.correct: It started to rain and thunder.
options: He was bit by a dog.
Nothing, he just walked back into the house.
It started to rain and thunder.
questions.explanation:
It started to rain and thunder.

	He came back inside all wet from the rain. Frederick ended up locking himself in the bathroom again. This time, when Sam got locked out, he didn't climb down the tree but watched Frederick from the tree.

Cotton.

	She made a comment before Woody entered that Kelly was "dumber than cotton". She obviously thought Kelly was dumber than Woody, and Woody was as dumb as cotton.

questions.text: How much money did Henri "borrow" from Woody?
questions.explanation:
$10.

	He asked to borrow it until payday. Woody asked when payday was, and Henri replied, "How do I know, you're the one who is working."

questions.text: Who got into a bar fight?
questions.explanation:
Woody.

	Henri kept saying, "I'm going to steal your girlfriend," until Woody went after him. He crashed into someone else who pushed him. Then that started the bar fight.
